name: CAD Maestro
about: Think your designing skills are unmatched? Think that you can design better than others? Then here's a event to prove your claim. Celesta presents CAD Maestro, the design event wherein you will have to design a CAD drawing of proposed problem and send it to us. The best design wins! Problem statement will be released soon, please follow our Facebook page, Twitter handle, official website and app for further updates.
